text: in September which means it is back to
school now when I pick it back to school
I always think of what am I going to eat
for lunch so in today's video I'm going
to show you three lunch ideas or three
back to school bento ideas or for those
of you were just coming back from summer
vacation and heading back to work three
lunch ideas for you guys as well now the
great thing about this is that these
bento boxes can be made in advance the
night before so you can actually cook it
as a meal then have plenty of leftovers
to the next few days your co-workers and
fellow students will be so jealous so
with that let's get started bento box
one is braised pork over rice start with
a bit of cooked rice and a few scoops in
my Taiwanese raised pork recipe for
veggies I think this goes well with baby
bok choy I'm actually using 1 medium
sized baby bok choy here topped with
optional pickled radishes and cilantro
can have a soy sauce egg or a whole one
if you're like me and you can't eat just
half finally a handful of grapes for
dessert bento box 2 is pan fried tofu
it's actually a simpler version of my
tofu with miso ginger sauce recipe
I like to serve this one with the side
of stir-fried broccoli with minced
garlic
now since this tofu is plain I'm going
to garnish it with some green onions
tossed lightly in some olive oil and sea
salt add a pinch of sesame seeds and a
dash or two Japanese crushed red pepper
and YUM an optional of course is a whole
soy sauce egg complemented by your
choice of fresh fruit bento box 3 is pot
stickers with edamame pan fry your pot
stickers the night before I recommend at
least 5 to 6 pieces per person and make
sure they are extra crispy prepare a
small side of low-sodium soy sauce
sweetened with some cane sugar and
garnished with some green onions and
sesame seeds or you can use chili sauce
if you prefer and for veggies prepare a
side of cooked edamame and topped with a
pinch or two of sea salt flakes and
finally for dessert let's go with
something different how about some green
tea chocolates these ones are literally
melt in your mouth and they are so
delicious I'm going to put two pieces in
this lucky bento box
so these are my three bento box ideas
that you guys can try this week now I'm
curious which one of these bento boxes
is your favorite tofu pork or pot
sticker let me know by posting in the
comments below and if you haven't
already please subscribe to my channel
the button is right here you'll be the
first to know where my next video comes
out which is going to be how to make
Chinese doughnut
I'm angel I hope you like this video and
I will see you guys soon bye
